name: Ratalooille
description:
In house uni game jam with the theme Nintendo Game and Watch, inspired by Donkey Kong.

Controls: Move Left & Right arrow keys, Jump Up arrow key, use hammer Space (game mode B and C).

Thanks to everyone that helped make this!
